Follow live @fhollande's speech in Boulogne-sur-Mer https://t.co/xD7igXEaix
@ fhollande "I want to remember the memories that attach me to this city of Boulogne-sur-Mer"
. @ fhollande "Almost 6 years ago, I made my first trip as a candidate"
. @ fhollande "We went to see the fisheries representatives, their concern was huge, as were their criticisms of the EU"
. @ fhollande "I told them to trust Europe as a regulator of the fishing industry."
. @ fhollande "The results have been achieved thanks to Europe and its regulation, now the Brexit worries"
. @ fhollande "We can not give the British a certain number of rights without having reciprocity"
@ fhollande "I also visited Findus employees who asked me if they had a future."
"Today, this company has been consolidated and can see its future in a different way than it was 6 years ago." @fhollande
@ fhollande "It is a great satisfaction to know that we have been able to change the lives of our fellow citizens."
"I visited the industrial facilities of Outreau Technologies where I met employees very proud of their work" @fhollande
"We have put in place the jobs of the future, the youth guarantee, the hiring SME" @fhollande
"These are not gifts, or gifts for employment, the country has recovered, Social Security is strengthened" @fhollande
"Unedic has just been made sustainable by making companies that use shorter contracts more involved" @fhollande
@ fhollande "There is no political responsibility without being accountable to the citizens."
"Candidates should talk more about what they did than what they will do. That's how credibility is built up."
@ fhollande "I was often criticized for doing the synthesis but it was to avoid divisions."
"Rally is the essential condition for advancing any organization, and a country too" @fhollande
@ fhollande "The head of state must be aware that his primary duty is to gather, to prevent the country from fracturing."
@ fhollande "I do not get tired of coming back to the Pas-de-Calais, they are also my family origins."
"I know this vulnerable territory but especially full of assets" @fhollande
"We must always be aware that Europe, in particular, can guarantee peace." @fhollande
"Ensuring medical presence throughout the country is a very important issue." @fhollande
"Intercommunality has never been easy, but we can not lead a major project without working together" @fhollande
"You always have to have ideas, but ideas are not always popular at first." @fhollande
"If you do not want to be criticized, the best is to do nothing, what matters is what you do and what will be pursued by others"
@ fhollande "The elected representatives are at the front in every respect to prevent our fellow citizens from getting lost, they are there when there are difficulties"
@ fhollande "The virtual has taken too much space, we end up believing false information, conspiracies that do not exist (1/2)"
@ fhollande "People imagine that what happens to them is due to others but they are the ones responsible." (2/2) @fhollande
